entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
